title: A place in history : the temples
brief_description: “Summary: the inner and middle temples form an oasis of quiet in the heart of London. this is the centre for the legal profession. the two inns have occupied the temple area for over 600 years, and one of the most famous members, Jeremy Thorpe takes us on a tour and interviews people associated with the inns”
